page.title: 02DAY IN LIFE OF 9YR OLD
page.content: I wake up at about 6am,read for about an hour and a half,then I turn on the radio,get up and get dressed.I play a game or read until mum calls me for breakfast.I nearly always have corn- flakes and a piece of toast,then I go upstairs and wash,and clean my teeth and pack my bag.Then I go and call for Nicky to go to school.At school the first thing we do is go to assembly where we sing hymns and pray.When we come back up we do maths or English.At 10:30 we go out and you can buy peanuts.When we come back in we carry on with our work.At 12:00 we have lunch and then we go out to play. When we come in we sing.We say our prayers and then we go home.When I get home I ride my bike,watch TV or play with Nicky.At 6pm we have tea. After tea I watch TV until 8pm when I go to bed. Joanne Willetts 9 years
